participant_1.background:
I'm a night owl and I love the peace and quiet of the morning hours.
I love my dog, but I'm a bit of a loner.
i have few friends.
i retired so i can spend more time with my husband and helping people.
I find that my childhood cartoons inspire me to be more creative.

participant_2.background:
I often snack too much on sweets, even though I know it's not good for my health.
I worked at a call center before I got my job at the factory.
i freeze up in social situations.
my feet are size six womens.
i run a small bakery.

content.text: Doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing alright, thanks. I'm a night owl, so I'm still up, haha.
Oh, me too! I love the peace and quiet of the morning hours.
Me too! I also find that my childhood cartoons inspire me to be more creative.
That's awesome! I used to love cartoons when I was younger. I also like to bake, but I have to be careful because I have a sweet tooth.
Oh, that's cool! I've never really been much of a baker, but I love to eat baked goods.
Me too! I run a small bakery, so I'm always sampling my own treats.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm sure they're delicious. I love to try new things.
Thanks! I'm glad you like them. What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my dog, go for walks, and read books. I also like to help people.
That's great! I like to spend time with my family, go for walks, and bake. I also like to help people.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Yes, we do! I think we'd get along well.
